import { useState } from "react"; const UserForm = ({ setFirstName, setLastName, setRole, setLanguage, setUserPhoto, setEmail, setOldPassword, setPassword, setConfirmPassword, loading, firstName, lastName, role, language, email, page, }) => { const [oldPasswordType, setOldPasswordType] = useState(false); const [passwordType, setPasswordType] = useState(false); const [password2Type, setPassword2Type] = useState(false); return ( <>
setFirstName(e.target.value)} />
setLastName(e.target.value)} />
setRole(e)} /> setRole(e)} /> setRole(e)} /> setRole(e)} /> setRole(e)} />
setUserPhoto(e.target.files[0])} />
setEmail(e.target.value)} />
{page === "edit" && (
setOldPassword(e.target.value)} />
)}
setPassword(e.target.value)} />
setConfirmPassword(e.target.value)} />
); }; export default UserForm;
